text: Memory hole may refer to: * Memory Hole 1, a radio program * The memory hole, a concept in George Orwell's Nineteen Eighty-Four * Memory Hole (Quibi show), a show on Quibi hosted by Will Arnett In computing, it may refer to: * In a computer a slab, a contiguous area of memory ** An area of physical address space which does not map to main memory *** The hole between 640KB and 1MB on old IBM PC compatibles handled by DOS memory management *** The PCI hole in more modern computers * The Memory Hole (website) founded in 2002
title: Memory hole (disambiguation)
